examples.example: 我要把这个好主意立刻写下来，以免忘记。

translate.english: I will write down this good idea immediately to avoid forgetting.

examples.example: 我把美好的心愿认真地写下来，期待着它能早日实现。

translate.english: I carefully write down the beautiful wish and look forward to its early realization.

examples.example: 我将心中的感激之情认真地写下来，以此表达我对他的深深敬意。

translate.english: I carefully wrote down the gratitude in my heart to express my deep respect for him.
